name: Goldheart
description:
A small bullet-hell type game.

The greedy mage Lavka steals a mythical golden sphere from the village and it's up to the villager Skully to retrieve it by directing a wandering spirit's powers.

Disclaimer: Contains cartoony gore and adult language.

  • Bullet-hell-esc action adventure
  • 9 bosses
  • ~30-60 mins of gameplay

Controls:
Move - WASD
Shoot - LClick
Charge - RClick (Hold)
Dodge - Space
Pause - ESC
Interact - E
